Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from database_utils import get_database

# Check if referrals table exists and has referrer_id column
try:
    db = get_database()
    conn = db.get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check table existence
    cursor.execute(""""""SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = ''referrals''"""""")
    table_exists = cursor.fetchone()
    print(f''Referrals table exists: {table_exists is not None}'')
    
    if table_exists:
        # Check columns
        cursor.execute(""""""SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''referrals'' ORDER BY ordinal_position"""""")
        columns = [row[0] for row in cursor.fetchall()]
        print(f''Referrals table columns: {columns}'')
        print(f''referrer_id in columns: {""referrer_id"" in columns}'')
    
    conn.close()
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from database_utils import get_database

# Check current max_trials data for timing issues
try:
    db = get_database()
    conn = db.get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # Get all max_trials records
    cursor.execute(''SELECT user_id, trial_used, trial_start_time, trial_expires_at FROM max_trials ORDER BY trial_start_time DESC LIMIT 5'')
    trials = cursor.fetchall()
    
    print(''=== Recent Trial Records ==='')
    for trial in trials:
        user_id, used, start, expires = trial
        if start and expires:
            import datetime
            # Calculate actual duration
            start_dt = start if isinstance(start, datetime.datetime) else datetime.datetime.fromisoformat(str(start).replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
            expires_dt = expires if isinstance(expires, datetime.datetime) else datetime.datetime.fromisoformat(str(expires).replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
            duration_hours = (expires_dt - start_dt).total_seconds() / 3600
            print(f''User {user_id}: Used={used}, Duration={duration_hours:.1f}h'')
            print(f''  Start: {start_dt}'')
            print(f''  Expires: {expires_dt}'')
        else:
            print(f''User {user_id}: Used={used}, Duration=NULL'')
        print()
    
    conn.close()
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

import psycopg2
from database_utils import get_database

try:
    db = get_database()
    conn = db.get_connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check your current trial status and credits
    user_id = 104  # Your user ID
    
    # Check max_trials table
    cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM max_trials WHERE user_id = %s'', (user_id,))
    trial_data = cursor.fetchone()
    
    print(''=== TRIAL STATUS ==='')
    print(f''Trial record: {trial_data}'')
    
    # Check users table for credits and plan
    cursor.execute(''SELECT id, email, plan_type, trainer_credits, user_plan FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
    user_data = cursor.fetchone()
    
    print(''=== USER DATA ==='')
    print(f''User record: {user_data}'')
    
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import os

conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
cur = conn.cursor()

# Check your trial status
user_id = 104
cur.execute(''SELECT trial_active, trial_expires_at FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
result = cur.fetchone()

if result:
    trial_active, expires_at = result
    print(f''Trial Active (DB): {trial_active}'')
    print(f''Trial Expires: {expires_at}'')
    
    if expires_at:
        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
        if isinstance(expires_at, str):
            expires_dt = datetime.fromisoformat(expires_at.replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
        else:
            expires_dt = expires_at
        print(f''Current Time: {now}'')
        print(f''Trial Should Be Expired: {now > expires_dt}'')
        
        if now > expires_dt and trial_active:
            print(''ðŸ”§ FIXING: Expiring trial in database...'')
            cur.execute(''UPDATE users SET trial_active = FALSE WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
            conn.commit()
            print(''âœ… Trial expired in database'')

conn.close()
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
import os

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check your user account status
    user_id = 104  # Your user ID
    cur.execute(''SELECT id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires_at FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
    result = cur.fetchone()
    
    if result:
        user_id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires = result
        print(f''CURRENT USER STATUS:'')
        print(f''  User ID: {user_id}'')
        print(f''  Email: {email}'')
        print(f''  Plan: {user_plan}'')
        print(f''  Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
        print(f''  Trial Expires: {trial_expires}'')
        
        # Determine effective plan
        if trial_active and user_plan == ''bronze'':
            effective_plan = ''gold''
        else:
            effective_plan = user_plan
            
        print(f''  Effective Plan: {effective_plan}'')
        print()
        print(''EXPECTED FEATURES:'')
        
        if effective_plan == ''bronze'':
            print(''  - Basic: Decoder (3), Fortune (2), Horoscope (3)'')
            print(''  - NO Premium features'')
        elif effective_plan == ''silver'':
            print(''  - Basic: Decoder (15), Fortune (8), Horoscope (10)'')
            print(''  - Premium: Voice Journal, AI Images, Relationships, Meditations'')
            print(''  - NO Mini Studio'')
        elif effective_plan == ''gold'':
            print(''  - Basic: Decoder (unlimited), Fortune (unlimited), Horoscope (unlimited)'')
            print(''  - Premium: Voice Journal, AI Images, Relationships, Meditations'')
            print(''  - Gold Exclusive: Mini Studio'')
    else:
        print(''User not found'')
        
    conn.close()
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

import psycopg2
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import os

conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
cur = conn.cursor()

# Check your trial status
user_id = 104
cur.execute(''SELECT trial_active, trial_expires_at FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))

if result:
    trial_active, expires_at = result
    print(f''DATABASE Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
    print(f''DATABASE Trial Expires: {expires_at}'')
    
    if expires_at:
        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)

            conn.commit()
            print(''âœ… Trial expired in database'')

conn.close()
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import os

conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
cur = conn.cursor()

# Check your current user status
user_id = 104
cur.execute(''SELECT id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires_at FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
result = cur.fetchone()

if result:
    user_id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires = result
    print(f''DATABASE STATUS:'')
    print(f''  User ID: {user_id}'')
    print(f''  Email: {email}'')
    print(f''  Plan: {user_plan}'')
    print(f''  Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
    print(f''  Trial Expires: {trial_expires}'')
    
    if trial_expires:
        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
        if isinstance(trial_expires, str):
            expires_dt = datetime.fromisoformat(trial_expires.replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
        else:
            expires_dt = trial_expires.replace(tzinfo=timezone.utc) if trial_expires.tzinfo is None else trial_expires
        print(f''  Current Time: {now}'')
        print(f''  Trial Should Be Active: {now < expires_dt}'')
        
        # Determine what limits SHOULD show
        if user_plan == ''gold'':
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: âˆž daily (Gold tier)'')
        elif trial_active and now < expires_dt:
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: âˆž daily (Active trial gives Gold access)'')
        elif user_plan == ''silver'':
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: 15/8/10/15 daily (Silver tier)'')
        else:
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: 3/2/3/3 daily (Bronze tier)'')
    else:
        # No trial data
        if user_plan == ''gold'':
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: âˆž daily (Gold tier)'')
        elif user_plan == ''silver'':
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: 15/8/10/15 daily (Silver tier)'')
        else:
            print(''  EXPECTED LIMITS: 3/2/3/3 daily (Bronze tier)'')

conn.close()
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import os

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check your current user status
    user_id = 104  # Your user ID
    
    # Get full user data
    cur.execute(''''''SELECT 
        id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires_at, 
        artistic_time, trial_credits, last_credit_reset 
        FROM users WHERE id = %s'''''', (user_id,))
    
    result = cur.fetchone()
    
    if result:
        user_id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires, artistic_time, trial_credits, last_reset = result
        print(f''=== USER STATUS DEBUG ==='')
        print(f''User ID: {user_id}'')
        print(f''Email: {email}'')
        print(f''Plan: {user_plan}'')
        print(f''Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
        print(f''Trial Expires: {trial_expires}'')
        print(f''Artistic Time (Monthly): {artistic_time}'')
        print(f''Trial Credits: {trial_credits}'')
        print(f''Last Credit Reset: {last_reset}'')
        
        # Check if trial should be active
        if trial_expires:
            now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
            if isinstance(trial_expires, str):
                expires_dt = datetime.fromisoformat(trial_expires.replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
            else:
                expires_dt = trial_expires.replace(tzinfo=timezone.utc) if trial_expires.tzinfo is None else trial_expires
            print(f''Current Time: {now}'')
            print(f''Trial Should Be Active: {now < expires_dt}'')
            
        # Calculate expected total credits
        total_expected = artistic_time or 0
        if trial_active and user_plan == ''bronze'':
            total_expected += trial_credits or 60
            
        print(f''Expected Total Credits: {total_expected}'')
        
    else:
        print(''User not found'')
        
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
")
Bash(then sqlite3 backend/soulbridge.db "SELECT id, email, user_plan, trial_active, artistic_time, trial_credits FROM users WHERE id = 104 LIMIT 1;")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import os

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check your current user status
    user_id = 104  # Your user ID
    
    # Get full user data
    cur.execute(''''''SELECT 
        id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires_at, 
        credits, trial_credits, last_credit_reset, purchased_credits
        FROM users WHERE id = %s'''''', (user_id,))
    
    result = cur.fetchone()
    
    if result:
        user_id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires, credits, trial_credits, last_reset, purchased_credits = result
        print(f''=== USER STATUS DEBUG ==='')
        print(f''User ID: {user_id}'')
        print(f''Email: {email}'')
        print(f''Plan: {user_plan}'')
        print(f''Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
        print(f''Trial Expires: {trial_expires}'')
        print(f''Credits: {credits}'')
        print(f''Trial Credits: {trial_credits}'')
        print(f''Purchased Credits: {purchased_credits}'')
        print(f''Last Credit Reset: {last_reset}'')
        
        # Check if trial should be active
        if trial_expires:
            now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
            if isinstance(trial_expires, str):
                expires_dt = datetime.fromisoformat(trial_expires.replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
            else:
                expires_dt = trial_expires.replace(tzinfo=timezone.utc) if trial_expires.tzinfo is None else trial_expires
            print(f''Current Time: {now}'')
            print(f''Trial Should Be Active: {now < expires_dt}'')
            
        # Calculate expected total credits
        total_expected = credits or 0
        if purchased_credits:
            total_expected += purchased_credits
        if trial_active and user_plan == ''bronze'':
            total_expected += trial_credits or 60
            
        print(f''Expected Total Credits: {total_expected}'')
        
    else:
        print(''User not found'')
        
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc()
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
import os

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check what columns exist in the users table
    cur.execute(''''''
        SELECT column_name, data_type, is_nullable, column_default 
        FROM information_schema.columns 
        WHERE table_name = ''users'' 
        ORDER BY ordinal_position
    '''''')
    
    columns = cur.fetchall()
    print(''=== PRODUCTION USERS TABLE COLUMNS ==='')
    column_names = []
    for col in columns:
        column_name, data_type, nullable, default = col
        column_names.append(column_name)
        print(f''{column_name}: {data_type} (nullable: {nullable}, default: {default})'')
    
    # Check for missing expected columns
    expected = [''credits'', ''purchased_credits'', ''artistic_time'', ''trial_credits'']
    missing = [col for col in expected if col not in column_names]
    
    if missing:
        print(f''\nâš ï¸ MISSING COLUMNS: {missing}'')
    else:
        print(f''\nâœ… All expected columns present'')
    
    conn.close()
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f''âŒ Error (expected - not connected to production): {e}'')
")

import psycopg2
import os

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
    cur = conn.cursor()
    
    # Check your current user status in the database
    user_id = 104  # Your user ID
    cur.execute(''SELECT id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires_at FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
    result = cur.fetchone()
    
    if result:
        user_id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires = result
        print(f''DATABASE USER STATUS:'')
        print(f''  User ID: {user_id}'')
        print(f''  Email: {email}'')
        print(f''  Plan: {user_plan}'')
        print(f''  Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
        print(f''  Trial Expires: {trial_expires}'')
        
        print(f''\nFor AI Images, user should see:'')
        if user_plan == ''gold'':
            print(f''  AI Image Tier: gold'')
            print(f''  Monthly Limit: 999 (displayed as unlimited)'')
        elif trial_active and user_plan == ''bronze'':
            print(f''  AI Image Tier: silver (trial access)'')
            print(f''  Monthly Limit: 10 (Silver tier access)'')
        else:
            print(f''  AI Image Tier: {user_plan}'')
            if user_plan == ''silver'':
                print(f''  Monthly Limit: 10'')
            else:
                print(f''  Monthly Limit: 0 (Bronze - locked)'')
    else:
        print(''User not found'')
        
    conn.close()
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:sDCOyvWZKSxyJvnJBZNSJemzZKbbSjIT@postgres-wj-8.railway.internal:5432/railway" python -c "
import psycopg2
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import os

conn = psycopg2.connect(os.environ.get(''DATABASE_URL''))
cur = conn.cursor()

# Check your current status
user_id = 104
cur.execute(''SELECT id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires_at FROM users WHERE id = %s'', (user_id,))
result = cur.fetchone()

if result:
    user_id, email, user_plan, trial_active, trial_expires = result
    print(f''DATABASE STATUS:'')
    print(f''  User ID: {user_id}'')
    print(f''  Email: {email}'')
    print(f''  Plan: {user_plan}'')
    print(f''  Trial Active: {trial_active}'')
    print(f''  Trial Expires: {trial_expires}'')
    
    if trial_expires:
        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
        if isinstance(trial_expires, str):
            expires_dt = datetime.fromisoformat(trial_expires.replace(''Z'', ''+00:00''))
        else:
            expires_dt = trial_expires.replace(tzinfo=timezone.utc) if trial_expires.tzinfo is None else trial_expires
        print(f''  Current Time: {now}'')
        print(f''  Trial Should Be Active: {now < expires_dt}'')

conn.close()
")
